Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to comply with Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in refusing to postpone the deportation order
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA) s. 45
Crimes.Application_Facts: Samad was found inadmissible on security grounds; requested postponement for ministerial relief but Board issued deportation order due to delays and lack of discretion
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Federal Court dismissed judicial review application
Crimes.Remedy_Requested: Postponement of deportation order pending ministerial relief
Crimes.Court_Ruling: No reviewable error; decision was reasonable and within legal standards
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Admitted membership in subversive organization, deemed inadmissible
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Security concerns related to alleged ties with terrorist/subversive organization
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Indefinite delay in ministerial relief process
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Judicial review of Board's refusal to postpone removal order
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Not applicable – based on admission and security assessment
Crimes.Application_Basis: Mandatory removal upon finding of inadmissibility
Crimes.Relief_Sought: Stay of removal pending ministerial relief
Crimes.Governing_Rule: Board must issue removal order if inadmissibility is established
Crimes.Harm_Assessment: Risk of persecution or harm upon return not considered by Board
Crimes.Cause_Description: Samad claimed refugee status but was found inadmissible due to security ties
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Relied on admitted facts and security information
Crimes.Legal_Provision_Violated: IRPA s. 45 (failure to comply with mandatory removal)
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: No procedural unfairness in evidence handling
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Issue: Federal Court jurisdiction over judicial review
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Board lacks discretion to delay removal under IRPA s. 45

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board erred in refusing to postpone the deportation order
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Based on credible security-related information and admission
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Deportation order issued; no postponement granted
Crimes.Burden_of_Proof: On Minister to establish inadmissibility on balance of probabilities
Crimes.Legal_Rule: Board must issue removal order upon finding of inadmissibility
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Lack of discretion to delay removal despite pending relief
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Security inadmissibility due to association with subversive group
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Considered: Membership in organization linked to subversion/terrorism
Crimes.Applicant_Challenge: Argued inadequate reasons and lack of legitimate expectation
Crimes.Resolution_Mechanism: Administrative determination followed by judicial review
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility_or_Allegatio: Security grounds – association with terrorist/subversive entity

Crimes.Threat_Assessment: Based on affiliation with known subversive group
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Potential for future involvement in terrorist activities
Crimes.Nature_of_Acts: Membership and support for organization engaged in terrorism
Crimes.Nature_of_Membership: Active or passive membership in proscribed group
Crimes.Key_Evidence_Issue: Reliability and sufficiency of security information
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: Closed hearing procedures used for sensitive evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Limited ability to challenge secret evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness_Issue: Alleged lack of meaningful opportunity to respond
Crimes.Detention_Factors: Possible prolonged detention due to removal risk
Crimes.Length_of_Detention: Extended due to inability to remove
Crimes.Deportation_Risk: High – subject to removal to country of origin

Crimes.Crime_Name: Membership in an organization engaging in subversion by force
Crimes.National_Security_Element: Association with organization using force to overthrow government
Crimes.National_Security_Danger: Threat to public order and state security
Crimes.Threat_Assessment: Based on nature of organization’s objectives and methods
Crimes.Nature_of_Membership: General membership without leadership role indicated
Crimes.Procedural_Element: Right to representation, limited access to confidential info
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Inability to fully contest closed material
